verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I travelled down that lonely road,
And no one seemed to care.
The burden of my heavy load
Was more than I could bare.
I oft' complained to Jesus
How others treated me,
And then I heard him whisper
Follow Me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My feet were O so weary
Upon the Calvary road.
My burden was so heavy
I bowed beneath the load.
Be faithful weary pilgrim;
The city I can see.
Take up you cross and follow;
Follow Me.
